ygData.subject: Re: Maximals Attack!
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Yeah, just bring Warhead back and he should be fine. Bic: Warhead was still lying on the ground in a stasis lock.

OOC: Yeah, just bring Warhead back and he should be fine.

Bic: Warhead was still lying on the ground in a stasis lock.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> If that's what you like to do, then perhaps you should do it, and 
> not otherwise. At the moment, you didn't post for dodging Megatron's 
> attack, Sunhawk grabbed Megatron and put him into a headlock, and 
> then turned him around to face Kup's weaponfire. THAT is what's 
> wrong. You should be posting that Sunhawks tries to grab Megatron to 
> put him into a headlock, not that he suddenly has him in a headlock. 
> =)
> 
> Cause talking ooc style is delaying Megatron, I'm going to just go 
> with that you've done. I'm not sure that Azure wants Warhead dead, 
> so Megatron is going to just try to run with Warhead. Heh, he's got 
> the whole maximal base running him down right now eh. =P
> 
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron's axe swishes harmlessly past Sunhawk's side. The over 
> powered swing allows Sunhawk to grapple him, and get him into a 
> headlock.
> 
> "Hah, a headlock?!" Megatron gets hit by one of Kup's shots, a char 
> mark appears on his back armour, then he grabs for Sunhawk's legs, 
> attempting to try to throw him at Kup, along with a plasma blast. 
> (he's going to throw Sunhawk and try to hit him with a plasma blast 
> after the throw)
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Here's how I like to do it.  I post what he attempts, you can 
> > intercept.  If you intercept his attempts (start your own post) 
> > halfway though, everything after that is null, and void.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > Watch your posting, if you want something to happen to Megatron, 
> > you 
> > > have to attempt to do it, not just do it. (aka moding) So, 
> propose 
> > > an action, and i'll post accordingly. =)
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > Sunhawk grabbed Megatron and threw him into a position
> > > > to take the shots in the middle of his back.
> > > >
